dungeon.logic

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeon.logic.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Hero

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass of the characters present in the game. Atributes: letter - letter that represents the character in the board dir - current moving direction l,c - position in board
    Author:
    Domingos

      • moveCharacter

        public boolean moveCharacter(Board board)
        Changes the coordinates of the characters according the moving direction, if the movement is valid
        Parameters:
        board - - current board to check if the character makes a valid move (doesn't collide with a wall, for instance)
        Returns:
        return 'true' if the movement is valid, 'false' if it is invalid (in which case, the coordinates of the character remain unchanged)
